title: Dode (L. A.)
body:
French botanist who wrote in the Bulletin de la Societé Dendrologique de France, in 1907, a work with the following title: Un nouveau Sorbus.

This new Sorbus is the S. maderensis, which is found near Pico do Arieiro, etc..

Pico do Arieiro: Location where the Sorbus maderensis, described by the botanist L. A. Dode, is found.

L. A. Dode: French botanist who described the Sorbus maderensis.

1907: Publication of the work 'Un nouveau Sorbus' by L. A. Dode in the Bulletin de la Societé Dendrologique de France.
